author: Daniel Greene
description:
Amazon has been flooding Audible Plus with titles—not to help authors, but to subsidize their larger streaming ambitions. An insider look at how the system works suggests that Amazon is using author earnings to prop up its subscription model, cutting into fair pay while marketing Audible Plus as a win for readers. Sign the petition here: https://chng.it/mdgp8mZffb
